welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fritzlar, Germany! This charming city is known for its historical buildings, quaint streets, and friendly community. We invite you to soak in the beauty and history of Fritzlar and make unforgettable memories here. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
